posts.post_content: I can't speak to this card in constructed; sure, 7 for a 9/9 shroud is pretty solid, if not part of a pro combo engine. What I can say is that this gentleman is an absolute BOMB in limited play. Turn 1 Llanowars, turn 6 shrouded 9/9... The only way to clear him is to gang block and lose all your men, or to throw down a [Righteousness](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Righteousness). Made a huge splash in our friendly draft-- all of a sudden the [Ball Lightning](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ball Lightning) and [Lightning Elemental](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Elemental)s I'd pulled to beat down opposing creatures don't seem so big!
posts.html:
I can't speak to this card in constructed; sure, 7 for a 9/9 shroud is pretty solid, if not part of a pro combo engine. What I can say is that this gentleman is an absolute BOMB in limited play. Turn 1 Llanowars, turn 6 shrouded 9/9... The only way to clear him is to gang block and lose all your men, or to throw down a Righteousness. Made a huge splash in our friendly draft-- all of a sudden the Ball Lightning and Lightning Elementals I'd pulled to beat down opposing creatures don't seem so big!

Posted By: Talshor (7/24/2009 3:04:04 PM)

posts.post_content: It may be true that one can do better with seven mana. Especially when you consider seven mana going towards a combo. I love that M10 has new cards in it. It's certainly an exciting new base set. I see this card as filling the [Verdant Force](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Verdant Force) slot. Having said that, I must admit that I see more playablity in [Verdant Force](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Verdant Force) than this card. Automated tolken creation is just so dynamic. Not that this is a bad card; it certainly seems apt at playing the role of a finisher with more longevity than most large creatures due to Shroud.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: very solid 7 drop. you can certainly give it trample, as was mentioned. both garruk and overrun give trample to your creatures boardwide, not targeted, and both are perfectly in line in terms of colors =). As I said, solid 7 drop, even better on turn 3 =P, pulled off that once, and only once. turn 1 llanowar elves. turn 2, 3 more llanowar elves (3 in opening hand, drew 4th). turn 3, tap 3 lands and 4 elves for 9/9 shroud.
